name: Imitation
tagline: Imitation is a plugin for the gedit text editor, that allows the user to edit a document in multiple places simultaneously, to aid repetitive programming tasks.
body:
# Imitation Archive
This page contains the demo video and historic releases for Imitation. Please see the [official README](https://github.com/code-tree/imitation/) for more information about Imitation.

## Video
TODO

## Historic Versions
These are hosted here in case anyone is still using an old version of gedit. Please see the [GitHub repo](https://github.com/code-tree/imitation/) for the current version (gedit 3.8+).

Imitation 1.1 (gedit 3.0-3.7)
Multi-edit 1.2.2 (gedit 2)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
